alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Hamilton; Jefferson; Perry; Wayne (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:26PM CDT until July 01 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Perry County in south central Illinois... Southwestern Wayne County in south central Illinois... Jefferson County in south central Illinois... Western Hamilton County in south central Illinois... Franklin County in south central Illinois... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 525 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Salem to near Mount Vernon to near Christopher, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, West Frankfort, Benton, Christopher, Rend Lake Area, Sesser, Wayne City, Woodlawn, Bluford, Valier, West City, Thompsonville, Ina, North City, Dahlgren, Buckner, Dix, Waltonville, Bonnie and Belle Rive. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 66 and 105. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 63 and 100. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
